import React from 'react' import useStyle from './Style.js' import {Card,CardActionArea,CardContent,Button,Typography,CardActions,CardMedia} from '@material-ui/core' const NewsCard = ({article:{description,author,title,url,urlToImage,publishedAt,content,source},i}) => { const classes=useStyle(); var date=(new Date(publishedAt)) date=date.toDateString console.log(date) return (
{publishedAt} {source.name}
{title} {description} {i+1} ) } export default NewsCard
